messages.content: Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready?
Yes let's start
Can you introduce yourself?
Sure, my name is Hriday. I live in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
Great, Hriday. Moving on to the next question,Can you tell me more about your project Online Voting System?
Sorry, I am not able to recall.
Shall we move ahead?
Yes
Okay,Hriday.Moving on to the next question,could you tell me more about your project Deep Image Classifier?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay,Hriday. This question is being skipped.Why did you use RNN to build the deep image classifier?
I don't know, I am not sure.
Shall we move ahead?
Yes please
Okay, Hriday. Moving on to the next question. Why did you use Tensorflow?
Pytorch is a great tool provides all the features to build complex Machine Learning applications as well as it does have a good community support.
Your answer is not satisfactory. Please try again.
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Hriday. This question is being skipped. Can you tell me about your experience at Evaluaitor?
I was a Machine Learning Intern at EvaluAItor.
And what were your responsibilities at Evluaitor?
I played an important role in fine-tuning and creating new datasets for the model.
What type of new datasets did you create at Evaluaitor?
They were training and validation datasets for the model.
Could you also explain how these datasets you created at Evaluaitor are used by the model?
I won't say.
Please stay focused on the interview.
My bad.
Please continue with the previous question - Could you also explain how these datasets you created at Evluaitor are used by the model?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Hriday. This question is being skipped. I can see that you've mentioned Tensorflow as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
Yes, sure.
Please go ahead.
I've mainly used it in my Deep Learning projects like the one you asked about above. It makes it easy to train and use those models.
Good, Hriday. Could you tell me what Tensors are?
Tensors are the fundamental data structures used to represent and manipulate data.
Nice, Hriday. What's the maximum dimension for any tensor?
There's no limit as such.
Nice, Hriday. What's constant in Tensorflow?
TensorFlow constants are tensors with immutable values that remain fixed during the entire computation.
Correct, Hriday. I can see that you've mentioned C++ as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
I've mainly used it for competitive programming.
Great, Hriday.Could you tell me what language is C++ superset of?
I don't know.
Shall we move ahead?
I don't know.
You could answer this question or move ahead.
move ahead.
Okay, Hriday. Moving on to the next question. Could you tell me what type of sort does C++ use for sorting?
Give me some time to think.
Sure, take your time.
I think it's Introsort.
Correct, Hriday. Could you tell me about Introsort?
I don't know.
Shall we move ahead?
I think it's bubble sort and insertion sort combo.
Your answer is not satisfactory. Please try again.
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay Hriday ,thank you for your time. You can click on exit to leave this interview. We will get back to you soon.
Thanks.
You will be able to see the results as well as the feedback on EvaluAItor dashboard. Goodbye and have a good day ahead.
